cookies.text: This website uses its own or third-party cookies to facilitate your navigation. To continue browsing, accept its use, otherwise the web page may not work correctly

whatsappButton: Hello, I want more information about your school.

whoweare.parrafo1: Easy Sailing emerges from our passion for the sea and the desire to share this passion through teaching, reaching the widest possible audience.
whoweare.parrafo2: We are a dedicated, multilingual team committed to providing quality training and exciting nautical activities for all types of audiences.
whoweare.parrafo3: Our logo represents the simplicity with which a child understands sailing, taking that simplicity as the identity and philosophy of learning, hence the name “Easy Sailing“.
whoweare.parrafo4: Our emblem, “Fulfilling Dreams“, comes from our belief that the sea enriches life, and we want to be a part of all those individuals for whom learning and engaging in nautical activities are dreams come true.
whoweare._parrafo5: We use English terminology because our school has an international scope, as our team is composed of multilingual individuals.
whoweare._misionTexto: To have the broadest reach possible through education and nautical activities.
whoweare._visionTexto: To be the reference school in Campello (Alicante).
whoweare._valoresTexto: To maintain high quality standards and promote activity among women, children, and less privileged sectors.

paz.parrafo1: An entrepreneur of Spanish nationality, holding a degree in Business Administration and Management, Padi Advanced diving and Professional Skipper of Recreational Vessels.
paz.parrafo2: The first female founder and instructor of a nautical school in the province of Alicante.
paz.parrafo3: She has studied and worked in multiple European countries and has been a sailor for years, being part of the crew of the Altea's vessel, Limbo.
paz.idiomas: Languages: Spanish, English, French, and German.

jean.parrafo1: An entrepreneur and Port Captain, with dual French and Spanish nationality, who has been involved in Charter activities since 2018.
jean.parrafo2: Having lived in various countries and run his own company in Paris, he brings an international perspective to the school and he provides a better service to our French-speaking residents in Campello and surrounding areas
jean.parrafo3: Both of us share a passion for the sea, we are neighbors in Campello, and we believe in the development of the port for greater international visibility and nautical activities.

cursos.introduccion: Easy Sailing offers official training as well as other private courses.
cursos.introduccion2: We are adapting our offer to your demand.
cursos.introduccion3: We are an Official School approved by the government of the Valencian Community.
cursos.introduccion4: We will introduce the PER course and the cruising sail practice as soon as possible.

LicenciaNavegacion.Reserva: Hello, I want to book a place for the Navigation Licence.
LicenciaNavegacion.Subtitulo: This licence does not have an exam and does not expire and can be obtained from the age of 16 with parental consent.
LicenciaNavegacion.Parrafo1: This licence does not have an exam and does not expire and can be obtained from the age of 16 with parental consent.
LicenciaNavegacion.Parrafo2: The Navigation License, known as 'Licencia de Navegación' in Spain, will allow you to drive boats up to 6 meters in length, up to 2 miles away from the coast, between sunrise and sunset (not allow during the night).
LicenciaNavegacion.Parrafo3: It also allows you to drive Jet Skis without power restriction.
LicenciaNavegacion.Parrafo4: A medical certificate is required for the Licence.
LicenciaNavegacion.Parrafo5: Easy Sailing has managed to close agreements for its students to get the cheapest price on the market for the medical certificate. (Ask us after booking)

Bulletpoint.Heading: Attributions Navigation Licence
Bulletpoint.Punto1Texto: Navigation Licence allows you to drive boats up to 6 meters in length.
Bulletpoint.Punto2Texto: You can drive boats up to 2 miles away from the coast.
Bulletpoint.Punto3Texto: You will be allowed to drive boats between sunrise and sunset
Bulletpoint.Punto4Texto: You will be allowed to drive boats without power limit.
Bulletpoint.Punto5Texto: You will be allowed to drive any kind of Jet Skis.

PerVela.Reserva: Hello, I want more information about PER and Sail.
PerVela.Parrafo1: We are doing everything possible to bring cruising sailing to Campello (Alicante).
PerVela.Parrafo2: If you are interested in receiving cruise sailing classes, send us a message and we will contact you as soon as this modality is available.

LnParticular.Reserva: Hello, I want to book for your Intensive private Navigation Licence.
LnParticular.Subtitulo: We are the first school in the region of Alicante to offer an Intensive Navigation License program.
LnParticular.Parrafo1: Easy Sailing is the main school for our foreign people, being able to provide information about our services in Spanish, English, French and German.
LnParticular.Parrafo2: In response to the demand and needs of our people, we are the first school in the province of Alicante to offer an Intensive Navigation License program.
LnParticular.Parrafo3: It is done in pairs with a total of 2 students per group, being able to choose the language among Spanish, English and French and with a duration of 4 hours to practice intensively all the necessary maneuvers to drive correctly a boat of 6 meter long.

ClasesPerfec.Reserva: Hello, I want to book your Improvement Lessons.
ClasesPerfec.Subtitulo: If you already have your Navigation License, but you don’t feel confident enough to steer a boat, we have several options for you.
ClasesPerfec.Parrafo1: If you already have your Navigation License, but you don’t feel confident enough to steer a boat, we have several options for you.
ClasesPerfec.ParticularesTexto: Private lessons at 40 euros per hour.
ClasesPerfec.GruposTexto: Groups of 4 people with a duration of 2 hours.
ClasesPerfec.MixtoTexto: We give you a 20 minute review of the most important things for sailing and you would steer an inflatable boat for five people during two hours.

IntroNavegacion.Reserva: Hello, I want to book a place for your Nautical Baptism for Groups.
IntroNavegacion.Subtitulo: If you want to have a nautical baptism and discover if this is your element, you have this activity of two hours long where we will sail around Campello (Alicante) guided by a professional instructor.
IntroNavegacion.Parrafo1: If you want to have a nautical baptism and discover if this is your element, you have this activity of two hours long where we will sail around Campello (Alicante) guided by a professional instructor.

alquileres.introduccion: Easy Sailing offers rentals boats with and without a navigation license. We are a school, so if you don ́t have a license and you would like to obtain it, we will help you to get it in a fast and easy way.

hulk.notaPrecio: All rates include 20 minutes of additional training from a nautical instructor
hulk.reserva: Hello, I want to rent the boat HULK.

easy_sailing.reserva: Hello, I want to rent the boat EASY SAILING.

alma.reserva: Hello, I want to rent the boat ALMA.

actividades.introduccion: Easy Sailing offers a wide variety of Activities to enjoy the sea.
actividades.introduccion2: Do not think twice and contact us with any questions you have.
actividades.introduccion3: We are a Tourist Company authorized by the government of the Valencian Community.

charterTabarca.subtitulo: Discover the wonderful island of Tabarca with a guided tour leaving from Campello or Alicante.
charterTabarca.incluidos: Snorkel, Paddle Surf and inflatable Boat with oar.
charterTabarca.actividad: The activity includes guided Snorkelling to the Pirate's cave, the possibility of practicing Paddle surfing and the use of the inflatable rowing Boat in the sea.
charterTabarca.aclaracion: It is possible to hire up to 2 extra hours (30€ per hour).
charterTabarca.aclaracion3: The activity is conducted with a nautical school instructor, offering an opportunity to gain an introduction to navigation.

charterBenidorm.subtitulo: Enjoy the surroundings of the island of Benidorm, a natural reserve to discover, with our guided tour.
charterBenidorm.incluidos: Snorkel, Paddle Surf and inflatable Boat with oar.
charterBenidorm.actividad: The activity includes the possibility of practicing Snorkeling, Paddle surfing and the use of the inflatable rowing Boat in the sea.
charterBenidorm.aclaracion: It is possible to hire up to 2 extra hours (25€ per hour).
charterBenidorm.aclaracion2: The activity is conducted with a nautical school instructor, offering an opportunity to gain an introduction to navigation.

expSolCena.subtitulo: Come and enjoy this great experience with your partner, family or friends
expSolCena.incluidos: Skipper + Petrol + Drinks + Dinner on board + Cleaning
expSolCena.actividad: If you have ever dreamed of a romantic dinner or with friends on board a boat watching the sunset, that day has arrived. Contact us!

expSolDesayuno.subtitulo: Come and enjoy this great experience with your partner, family or friends
expSolDesayuno.incluidos: Skipper + Petrol + Drinks + Breakfast on board + Cleaning
expSolDesayuno.actividad: Dawn as you have never experienced it before, from the beauty and tranquility of being in the middle of the sea, and accompanied by a delicious breakfast on board.

sportCalasSUP.subtitulo: Explore the Coves of Campello and surrounding areas with stops for Snorkeling and Paddle surfing.
sportCalasSUP.incluidos: Skipper + Petrol + Snorkel equipment + Paddle Surf + Snack and 1 Drink + Cleaning
sportCalasSUP.actividad: ESCRIBIR AQUI MEJOR DESCRIPCION DE LA ACTIVIDAD.

sportDiving.subtitulo: Do you need a Boat and Skipper for your diving trip with your own equipment? We organize it for you.
sportDiving.precio: Price according to the dive to be carried out. Check with the school.

sportMindful.subtitulo: Coming soon. Contact us to stay informed.

sportVelaCrucero.subtitulo: Coming soon. Contact us to stay informed.

partyBachelor.subtitulo: If you want to celebrate your bachelor/bachelorette party at sea, let us know what you would like to do, and we will organize it for you.
partyBachelor.aclaracion: We have a female skipper available for women's bachelorette parties.
partyBachelor.precio: Depends on the charter to be arranged. Please consult with the school.

partyBirthday.subtitulo: If you want to surprise your friends or family and celebrate in a different way, contact us.
partyBirthday.aclaracion: We will take care of everything: decoration, cake, and surprises if desired.
partyBirthday.precio: Depends on the charter to be arranged. Please consult with the school.

partyPhotos.subtitulo:
If you would like to have a beautiful photo shoot at sea, we provide
our boats for a sunrise or sunset charter of your choice.
partyPhotos.aclaracion: You can bring your own photographer or we can arrange it for you.
partyPhotos.precio: Depends on the charter to be arranged; please consult with the school.

partyRegalo.subtitulo: If you want to surprise your loved one with an original gift of one of our nautical activities, provide us with their details, and we will prepare a beautiful personalized gift card.
partyRegalo.aclaracion: Gift voucher included in the activity to be gifted at no additional cost.

empresas.subtitulo: If you are a company and want to have privileges for your employees in nautical training and activities, we propose:
empresas.parrafo1: Nautical training adapted to your work schedules and the possibility of being held at your facilities.
empresas.parrafo2: Exclusive discounts on training, charters, and rentals.
empresas.parrafo3: Organization of outings for employees and their families.

customMade.subtitulo: If you have not found what you are looking for in our activities, send us a message explaining the activity you would like to do and we will make a tailor-made program for you.
